sign-in: <input type='text' title='You need a minimum of 4 alphanumeric characters, the following special characters are allowed: _.' id='sign-in-username' placeholder='Your user name' value='Rambo' minlength='4' maxlength='25' pattern='^(?=.*[\w.])[\w.]{4,25}$' required>

<input type='password' title='You need a minimum of 8 alphanumeric characters, the following special characters are allowed: !@#$%^&*' id='sign-in-password' placeholder='Your password' value='G!raffeL0caleB0at' minlength='8' maxlength='64' pattern='^(?=.*[\w])[\w!@#$%^&*]{8,64}$' required>
